00040 /* Bitflags for edges */
00041 #define T2QDELETE   1
00042 #define T2QCOMPLEX  2
00043 #define T2QJOIN     4
00044 
00045 /* assumes edges are validated before reaching this poin */
00046 static float measure_facepair(BMVert *v1, BMVert *v2,
00047                               BMVert *v3, BMVert *v4, float limit)
00048 {
00049     /* gives a 'weight' to a pair of triangles that join an edge to decide how good a join they would make */
00050     /* Note: this is more complicated than it needs to be and should be cleaned up.. */
00051     float n1[3], n2[3], measure = 0.0f, angle1, angle2, diff;
00052     float edgeVec1[3], edgeVec2[3], edgeVec3[3], edgeVec4[3];
00053     float minarea, maxarea, areaA, areaB;
00054 
00055     /* First Test: Normal difference */
00056     normal_tri_v3(n1, v1->co, v2->co, v3->co);
00057     normal_tri_v3(n2, v1->co, v3->co, v4->co);
00058 
00059     if (n1[0] == n2[0] && n1[1] == n2[1] && n1[2] == n2[2]) angle1 = 0.0f;
00060     else angle1 = angle_v3v3(n1, n2);
00061 
00062     normal_tri_v3(n1, v2->co, v3->co, v4->co);
00063     normal_tri_v3(n2, v4->co, v1->co, v2->co);
00064 
00065     if (n1[0] == n2[0] && n1[1] == n2[1] && n1[2] == n2[2]) angle2 = 0.0f;
00066     else angle2 = angle_v3v3(n1, n2);
00067 
00068     measure += (angle1 + angle2) * 0.5f;
00069     if (measure > limit) {
00070         return measure;
00071     }
00072 
00073     /* Second test: Colinearity */
00074     sub_v3_v3v3(edgeVec1, v1->co, v2->co);
00075     sub_v3_v3v3(edgeVec2, v2->co, v3->co);
00076     sub_v3_v3v3(edgeVec3, v3->co, v4->co);
00077     sub_v3_v3v3(edgeVec4, v4->co, v1->co);
00078 
00079     /* a completely skinny face is 'pi' after halving */
00080     diff = 0.25f * (fabsf(angle_v3v3(edgeVec1, edgeVec2) - (float)M_PI_2) +
00081                     fabsf(angle_v3v3(edgeVec2, edgeVec3) - (float)M_PI_2) +
00082                     fabsf(angle_v3v3(edgeVec3, edgeVec4) - (float)M_PI_2) +
00083                     fabsf(angle_v3v3(edgeVec4, edgeVec1) - (float)M_PI_2));
00084 
00085     if (!diff) {
00086         return 0.0;
00087     }
00088 
00089     measure +=  diff;
00090     if (measure > limit) {
00091         return measure;
00092     }
00093 
00094     /* Third test: Concavity */
00095     areaA = area_tri_v3(v1->co, v2->co, v3->co) + area_tri_v3(v1->co, v3->co, v4->co);
00096     areaB = area_tri_v3(v2->co, v3->co, v4->co) + area_tri_v3(v4->co, v1->co, v2->co);
00097 
00098     if (areaA <= areaB) minarea = areaA;
00099     else minarea = areaB;
00100 
00101     if (areaA >= areaB) maxarea = areaA;
00102     else maxarea = areaB;
00103 
00104     if (!maxarea) measure += 1;
00105     else measure += (1 - (minarea / maxarea));
00106 
00107     return measure;
00108 }
00109 
00110 #define T2QUV_LIMIT 0.005f
00111 #define T2QCOL_LIMIT 3
00112 
00113 static int compareFaceAttribs(BMesh *bm, BMEdge *e, int douvs, int dovcols)
00114 {
00115     MTexPoly *tp1, *tp2;
00116     MLoopCol *lcol1, *lcol2, *lcol3, *lcol4;
00117     MLoopUV *luv1, *luv2, *luv3, *luv4;
00118     BMLoop *l1, *l2, *l3, *l4;
00119     int mergeok_uvs = !douvs, mergeok_vcols = !dovcols;
00120     
00121     l1 = e->l;
00122     l3 = e->l->radial_next;
00123     
00124     /* match up loops on each side of an edge corresponding to each ver */
00125     if (l1->v == l3->v) {
00126         l2 = l1->next;
00127         l4 = l2->next;
00128     }
00129     else {
00130         l2 = l1->next;
00131 
00132         l4 = l3;
00133         l3 = l4->next;
00134     }
00135 
00136     lcol1 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l1->head.data, CD_MLOOPCOL);
00137     lcol2 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l1->head.data, CD_MLOOPCOL);
00138     lcol3 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l1->head.data, CD_MLOOPCOL);
00139     lcol4 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l1->head.data, CD_MLOOPCOL);
00140 
00141     luv1 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l1->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00142     luv2 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l1->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00143     luv3 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l1->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00144     luv4 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->ldata, l1->head.data, CD_MLOOPUV);
00145 
00146     tp1 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->pdata, l1->f->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00147     tp2 = CustomData_bmesh_get(&bm->pdata, l2->f->head.data, CD_MTEXPOLY);
00148 
00149     if (!lcol1)
00150         mergeok_vcols = 1;
00151 
00152     if (!luv1)
00153         mergeok_uvs = 1;
00154 
00155     /* compare faceedges for each face attribute. Additional per face attributes can be added late */
00156 
00157     /* do VCOL */
00158     if (lcol1 && dovcols) {
00159         char *cols[4] = {(char *)lcol1, (char *)lcol2, (char *)lcol3, (char *)lcol4};
00160         int i;
00161 
00162         for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00163             if (cols[0][i] + T2QCOL_LIMIT < cols[2][i] - T2QCOL_LIMIT)
00164                 break;
00165             if (cols[1][i] + T2QCOL_LIMIT < cols[3][i] - T2QCOL_LIMIT)
00166                 break;
00167         }
00168 
00169         if (i == 3)
00170             mergeok_vcols = 1;
00171     }
00172 
00173     /* do UV */
00174     if (luv1 && douvs) {
00175         if (tp1->tpage != tp2->tpage) {
00176             /* do nothing */
00177         }
00178         else {
00179             int i;
00180 
00181             for (i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
00182                 if (luv1->uv[0] + T2QUV_LIMIT > luv3->uv[0] && luv1->uv[0] - T2QUV_LIMIT < luv3->uv[0] &&
00183                     luv1->uv[1] + T2QUV_LIMIT > luv3->uv[1] && luv1->uv[1] - T2QUV_LIMIT < luv3->uv[1])
00184                 {
00185                     if (luv2->uv[0] + T2QUV_LIMIT > luv4->uv[0] && luv2->uv[0] - T2QUV_LIMIT < luv4->uv[0] &&
00186                         luv2->uv[1] + T2QUV_LIMIT > luv4->uv[1] && luv2->uv[1] - T2QUV_LIMIT < luv4->uv[1])
00187                     {
00188                         mergeok_uvs = 1;
00189                     }
00190                 }
00191             }
00192         }
00193     }
00194 
00195     if (douvs == mergeok_uvs && dovcols == mergeok_vcols) {
00196         return TRUE;
00197     }
00198 
00199     return FALSE;
00200 }
00201 
00202 typedef struct JoinEdge {
00203     float weight;
00204     BMEdge *e;
00205 } JoinEdge;
00206 
00207 #define EDGE_MARK   1
00208 #define EDGE_CHOSEN 2
00209 
00210 #define FACE_MARK   1
00211 #define FACE_INPUT  2
00212 
00213 static int fplcmp(const void *v1, const void *v2)
00214 {
00215     const JoinEdge *e1 = (JoinEdge *)v1, *e2 = (JoinEdge *)v2;
00216 
00217     if (e1->weight > e2->weight) return 1;
00218     else if (e1->weight < e2->weight) return -1;
00219 
00220     return 0;
00221 }
00222 
00223 void bmo_join_triangles_exec(BMesh *bm, BMOperator *op)
00224 {
00225     BMIter iter, liter;
00226     BMOIter siter;
00227     BMFace *f1, *f2;
00228     BMLoop *l;
00229     BMEdge *e;
00230     BLI_array_declare(jedges);
00231     JoinEdge *jedges = NULL;
00232     int dosharp = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "cmp_sharp");
00233     int douvs =   BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "cmp_uvs");
00234     int dovcols = BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "cmp_vcols");
00235     int domat =   BMO_slot_bool_get(op, "cmp_materials");
00236     float limit = BMO_slot_float_get(op, "limit");
00237     int i, totedge;
00238 
00239     /* flag all edges of all input face */
00240     BMO_ITER (f1, &siter, bm, op, "faces", BM_FACE) {
00241         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f1, FACE_INPUT);
00242         BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, f1, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00243             BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, l->e, EDGE_MARK);
00244         }
00245     }
00246 
00247     /* unflag edges that are invalid; e.g. aren't surrounded by triangle */
00248     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00249         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EDGE_MARK))
00250             continue;
00251 
00252         if (!BM_edge_face_pair(e, &f1, &f2)) {
00253             BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, e, EDGE_MARK);
00254             continue;
00255         }
00256 
00257         if (f1->len != 3 || f2->len != 3) {
00258             BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, e, EDGE_MARK);
00259             continue;
00260         }
00261 
00262         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f1, FACE_INPUT) || !BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f2, FACE_INPUT)) {
00263             BMO_elem_flag_disable(bm, e, EDGE_MARK);
00264             continue;
00265         }
00266     }
00267     
00268     i = 0;
00269     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00270         BMVert *v1, *v2, *v3, *v4;
00271         BMFace *f1, *f2;
00272         float measure;
00273 
00274         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EDGE_MARK))
00275             continue;
00276 
00277         f1 = e->l->f;
00278         f2 = e->l->radial_next->f;
00279 
00280         v1 = e->l->v;
00281         v2 = e->l->prev->v;
00282         v3 = e->l->next->v;
00283         v4 = e->l->radial_next->prev->v;
00284 
00285         if (dosharp && !BM_elem_flag_test(e, BM_ELEM_SMOOTH))
00286             continue;
00287         
00288         if ((douvs || dovcols) && compareFaceAttribs(bm, e, douvs, dovcols))
00289             continue;
00290 
00291         if (domat && f1->mat_nr != f2->mat_nr)
00292             continue;
00293 
00294         measure = measure_facepair(v1, v2, v3, v4, limit);
00295         if (measure < limit) {
00296             BLI_array_growone(jedges);
00297 
00298             jedges[i].e = e;
00299             jedges[i].weight = measure;
00300 
00301             i++;
00302         }
00303     }
00304 
00305     if (!jedges)
00306         return;
00307 
00308     qsort(jedges, BLI_array_count(jedges), sizeof(JoinEdge), fplcmp);
00309 
00310     totedge = BLI_array_count(jedges);
00311     for (i = 0; i < totedge; i++) {
00312         BMFace *f1, *f2;
00313 
00314         e = jedges[i].e;
00315         f1 = e->l->f;
00316         f2 = e->l->radial_next->f;
00317 
00318         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f1, FACE_MARK) || BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, f2, FACE_MARK))
00319             continue;
00320 
00321         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f1, FACE_MARK);
00322         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, f2, FACE_MARK);
00323         BMO_elem_flag_enable(bm, e, EDGE_CHOSEN);
00324     }
00325 
00326     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00327         if (!BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EDGE_CHOSEN))
00328             continue;
00329 
00330 
00331         BM_edge_face_pair(e, &f1, &f2); /* checked above */
00332         BM_faces_join_pair(bm, f1, f2, e, TRUE);
00333     }
00334 
00335     BM_ITER_MESH (e, &iter, bm, BM_EDGES_OF_MESH) {
00336         if (BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, e, EDGE_MARK)) {
00337             /* ok, this edge wasn't merged, check if it's
00338              * in a 2-tri-pair island, and if so merg */
00339 
00340             f1 = e->l->f;
00341             f2 = e->l->radial_next->f;
00342             
00343             if (f1->len != 3 || f2->len != 3)
00344                 continue;
00345 
00346             for (i = 0; i < 2; i++) {
00347                 BM_ITER_ELEM (l, &liter, i ? f2 : f1, BM_LOOPS_OF_FACE) {
00348                     if (l->e != e && BMO_elem_flag_test(bm, l->e, EDGE_MARK)) {
00349                         break;
00350                     }
00351                 }
00352                 
00353                 /* if l isn't NULL, we broke out of the loo */
00354                 if (l) {
00355                     break;
00356                 }
00357             }
00358 
00359             /* if i isn't 2, we broke out of that loo */
00360             if (i != 2) {
00361                 continue;
00362             }
00363 
00364             BM_faces_join_pair(bm, f1, f2, e, TRUE);
00365         }
00366     }
00367 
00368     BLI_array_free(jedges);
00369 }
